name: system-info
description: Get up-to-date information about your computer resource usage.

system-info.refreshRate.markdownDescription:
Data refresh rate (in ms).

*Note: The more frequent the refresh, the more performance will be affected by the extension.*

system-info.location.description: The place on the status bar where the information will be displayed.
enumDescriptions: Information will be displayed on the left side of the status bar.
Information will be displayed on the right side of the status bar.

system-info.hideProcessorUsage.markdownDescription:
Hide CPU utilization.

*Note: The time it will take before an item disappears/appears depends on `#system-info.refreshRate#`.*

*Will be improved in the future.*

system-info.hideMemoryUsage.markdownDescription:
Hide RAM usage.

*Note: The time it will take before an item disappears/appears depends on `#system-info.refreshRate#`.*

*Will be improved in the future.*

system-info.coloredBackground.markdownDescription: Determines whether the background of items should be colored according to the utilization of the hardware.

system-info.warningBackgroundPercent.markdownDescription: Changes the color of the item to a warning color if the specified percentage is exceeded.

system-info.errorBackgroundPercent.markdownDescription: Changes the color of the item to a error color if the specified percentage is exceeded.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
